params._cliff: The time interval to the first withdraw in seconds.
params._feeSharing: The address of fee sharing contract.
params._vestingOwner: The address of an owner of vesting contract.

params._cliff: The time interval to the first withdraw in seconds.
params._feeSharing: The address of fee sharing contract.
params._vestingOwner: The address of an owner of vesting contract.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Vesting Factory: Contract to deploy vesting contracts of two types: vesting (TokenHolder) and team vesting (Multisig).

userdoc.notice: Factory pattern allows to create multiple instances of the same contract and keep track of them easier.
